metadata.description: Comprehensive mise task configuration skill for Claude Code with proper usage field argument handling, dependencies, caching, and best practices.

plugins.name: mise
plugins.description: Use when creating or editing mise, .mise.toml, or mise.toml task sections, creating mise task files in mise-tasks/ or .mise/tasks/ directories, configuring task arguments with usage field, setting task dependencies, or when user mentions mise task configuration.
